text: Hianagi antahiho, tamagri tvaonte'ma mani kagi'naza vahera zamazeri otisuge'za e'za eme tamazeri koro hugahaze. Ana nehu'za Amoni vahera eme tamahe kasopetresageta mago'mofonkura antahi omi maka kaziga ufre efre hugahaze. Ana hanage'za koro'ma freta vanaza vahera mago vahe'mo'e huno tamazeri atrua osugahie huno Anumzana Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
